content: single_crochet in next 14 sts total 32 sts note now we are going to start working on the neck area continue to work in continuous rounds/spiral using stitch markers to mark first stitch of each round round 16 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts skip 17 sts 1 single_crochet in next 7sts this will close up/form the neck area total 15 sts round 17 1 single_crochet in next 7 sts decrease 1 single_crochet in next 6 sts total 14 sts rounds 18 23 1 single_crochet in each st around total 14 sts note we are now going to working on the head round 24 1 single_crochet in next st 2 single_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 6 times total 21 sts round 25 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts 2 single_crochet in next st repeat work direction in the brackets around 6 times total 28 sts rounds 26 28 1 single_crochet in each st around total 28 sts round 29 1 single_crochet in next 8 sts decrease 1 single_crochet in next st decrease repeat work direction in the brackets around three more times 1 single_crochet in next 6 sts total 23 sts note we are now going to attach the eyes and the nose when placing eyes do not snap washer onto post until satisfied with the placement place the safety eyes about 5 stitches apart between rounds 28-29 place nose between eyes sew in place using the tail we left earlier when we fasten_off stuff lightly before attaching round 30 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts decrease repeat work direction in the brackets around 4 more times 1 single_crochet in next st decrease total 17 sts note we are now going to start to stuff the body neck and head lightly we will stuff more firmly just before we close up all the openings round 31 1 single_crochet in next st decrease repeat work direction in the brackets around 4 more times 1 single_crochet in next 2 sts total 12 sts note stuff head more firmly round 32 decrease repeat work direction in the brackets around 5 more times total 6 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing sew the head opening close tail with main color yarn round 1 make an magic_ring chain 1 doesn t count as a stitch work 6 single_crochet in the ring mark first stitch with stitch marker do not join total of 6 sts round 2 work 2 single_crochet in each st around total 12 sts round 3 1 single_crochet in each st around total 12 sts fasten_off leaving a long tail for sewing sew tail to body we are now going to attach the tail to the body do not stuff tail sew the tail to upper rear end of the llama being that the back of the llama is still open this should make it easier to sew the tail on do not attach the tail were we have to close up the back of
